com.opentok.cloud.controller.connection

Interface ConnectionListener


  • public interface ConnectionListener
    An event listener for connection-related events in the session.
    See Also:
    Session.addConnectionListener(), ConnectionEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectionCreated(ConnectionEvent event)
      One or more connection was created in the session.
      void onConnectionDestroyed(ConnectionEvent event, Connection.Reason reason)
      One or more connection was destroyed in the session.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectionCreated

        void onConnectionCreated(ConnectionEvent event)
        One or more connection was created in the session.
        Parameters:
        event - The ConnectionEvent object, which provides details on the Connection and Session objects related to this event.

      • onConnectionDestroyed

        void onConnectionDestroyed(ConnectionEvent event,
                         Connection.Reason reason)
        One or more connection was destroyed in the session.
        Parameters:
        event - The ConnectionEvent object, which provides details on the Connection and Session objects related to this event.
        reason - The reason the connection was destroyed.
